panels.description: The number of records that this task has consumed from the source but not yet produced to the target.
panels.title: Source Connector - Connect Outstanding Messages Queue

panels.description: Time duration that this task takes to commit its offsets to the target.
panels.title: Source Connector - Average Offset Commit Time

panels.description: Time duration between record timestamp in the source topic and the time when the source connector handles the record (aka. MM2 consumer lag time).
panels.title: Record Age

panels.description: The end to end latency from the record timestamp in the source topic to the time when the record is written successfully to the target cluster.
panels.title: Replication Latency

panels.description: The latency for synchronizing the consumer groups of the source cluster to the target cluster.

targets.expr: sum by (source, target, topic, partition, group) (kafka_connect_mirror_mirrorcheckpointconnector_checkpoint_latency_ms{strimzi_io_kind=~"KafkaMirrorMaker2",strimzi_io_cluster="$strimzi_mirror_maker_cluster_name"})

panels.title: Consumer Group Offset Sync Latency

panels.description: Consumer lag which in the context of the replication indicates whether the consumer in the source connector can keep up with the rate records are produced in the source.
panels.title: Consumer Lag

panels.description: Consumer lag which in the context of the replication indicates whether the consumer in the source connector can keep up with the rate records are produced in the source.
panels.title: Consumer Lag
